teams.name: Bethel Lutheran
teams.loan_because: Our mission is to connect people to Jesus Christ. We are the hands, feet, eyes and ear and body of Christ in the world.
teams.description: a community gathered of Lutheran Christians

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Sandy Ridge
teams.loan_because: Through micro-lending,we help communities grow through local, sustainable business.  This strenghthens people, communities, countries and the world.
teams.description: Sandy Ridge Farm seeks to promote local and sutainable agriculture in our community through our actions and our deeds

teams.name: Sherman Lindell
teams.loan_because: Sherman was a great man who be proud to see his fellow Americans supporting those in need.
teams.description: This is in Memorial of my grandfather, Sherman Lindell. He passed away in 2010 and I miss him very much. I have created this group to lead in his name.

teams.name: Merang TravelOffice
teams.loan_because: we care.

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

teams.loan_because: We have a Father that has been generous to us.

teams.name: Simon Fraser University (SFU)
teams.loan_because: We would like to leverage the principles of micro financing offered by Kiva and through the collective efforts of individual loans help support our neighbors around the world.
teams.description: Our team is comprised of students, friends, and family, who would like to make a loan on behalf of Simon Fraser University (SFU), a Canadian University located in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada with campuses throughout the Greater Vancouver Regional District.

teams.name: Bridarolli Family Project
teams.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give." - Winston Churchill
teams.description: Sam and Ellie were born in Oct 2009 and our project goal - "total loan impact" of $250,000.00 - was set.  A portion of everything our family makes goes to this project.  We include the kiddo's on every loan.  At some point the portfolio will be entirely turned over to the kids to manage.  Our hope ... Kiva can help teach our kids global responsibility and the importance of giving.  In doing so, help them also learn ... the world is not too big that they can't make a lasting and meaningful difference to the lives of many.

teams.name: Washington State
teams.loan_because: Each of us has a responsibility to all of us.

teams.name: Team Faust
teams.loan_because: We have a Father that has been generous to us.
teams.description: Goofy.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Gilchrist
teams.loan_because: We hope to give a hand up more than a handout, and we want our philanthropy to have a multiplier effect, continuing to circulate and help more and more people around the world
teams.description: Members of a family spanning three generations and multiple branches, with a heritage of service in southern and western Africa, and the Canadian far north

teams.name: Oregon friends
teams.loan_because: We loan because we can, we care and we believe in the dignity of the human spirit.
teams.description: Oregon is a very wonderful and blessed place. We can all share a little of our bounty to help everyone share and create their own garden of hope and beauty

teams.name: UUFP MicroLending
teams.loan_because: We believe in the inherent dignity and worth of every person; justice, equity and compassion in human relations; acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations; a free and responsible search for truth and meaning; the right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large; the goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all; respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description: We are a community sharing life's journey  for truth and meaning working together to ease suffering in our community, and to seek justice by joining our voices with those who need us.

teams.name: Poultry Partners
teams.loan_because: Small scale agriculture is the backbone of the world's' food supply and poultry is an easily raised protein.
teams.description: People who raise or are interested in poultry.

teams.name: The Zug Clan
teams.loan_because: We share a common belief that serving others is one of the most important and noble actions that one can take. We sincerely hope to have a positive impact on the life of others, friends or strangers.
teams.description: The members of our large family include business folk, dairy farmers, lawyers, musical entrepreneurs, teachers, outdoor adventurers, spiritual leaders, and several young students. We hope that our loans help you to accomplish your goals.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Episcopal Church in the United States
teams.loan_because: As Episcopalians, we are followers of Jesus Christ, our Lord, and believe in the Father, Son and Holy Spirit.  We strive to love our neighbors as ourselves and respect the dignity of every person.
teams.description: The Episcopal Church is part of the worldwide Anglican Communion, and traces its heritage to the beginnings of Christianity.  We celebrate our unity in Christ while honoring our differences, always putting the work of love before uniformity of opinion. We believe in amendment of life, the forgiveness of sin, and life everlasting.  All are welcome to find a spiritual home in the Episcopal Church.

teams.loan_because: we know what it's like to struggle as a small business team. We can only imagine what it's like without access to loans, but we'd rather not...and thus try to help out.

teams.loan_because: we believe empowering women is the key to alleviating social injustice and achieving world stability.

This tradition teaches how to live in the secular world with courage and compassion.

teams.name: Turning Pocket Change into Real Change
teams.loan_because: We can help make real change.

teams.name: TEAM GUYANA

teams.description: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.

teams.name: Sai Youth
teams.loan_because: We believe every small act can make a difference and we all have our duty to perform... duty of spreading happiness, duty of supporting others, duty to share with others, and duty to love... after all, we all are love... embodiments of love!
teams.description: Our team is based on five human values - Love, Truth, Peace, Non-Violence, and Right-Conduct. Our principles are "Love All, Serve All" and "Help Ever, Hurt Never"

teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Fitzgerald's Friendship Fund
teams.loan_because: We are grateful for our family, friends, and good fortune and wish to foster opportunity to other families around the globe...
teams.description: We are a typical American family with Midwestern roots in the great state of Oklahoma. Our close knit family members represent a wide variety of occupations in the fields of education, healthcare, oil and gas, law enforcement, and small business entrepreneurship.

teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: Team Toronto
teams.loan_because: The people who are lucky enough to live in Toronto care about creating a self sustaining legacy in all parts of civilization, and wish that economic conditions in more of the world could be like they are here.
teams.description: This team began with one person, but soon gained strength and momentum through the generosity of the people of Toronto, Canada and their friends. Now this team has over 300 members, has loaned hundreds of thousands of dollars over the past six years and is helping people all over the world. Join us today!!

teams.name: MoreThan12.org
teams.loan_because: We were created to love, and love is more than just what's in your "head" and "heart" for each other. Love has "hands."  It's not limited to what's trendy for the season. Love is a life value and a lifestyle. Love makes time and love makes sacrifices.
teams.description: A community of creative people who love and emulate Christ.

teams.name: New Direction
teams.loan_because: The Examined Life is worth living.
teams.description:
New Direction
How it works:
*Note â€“ The democratic nature of this project is dependent upon your use of the following social media tools: Etsy.com and Kiva.org

1. You buy a painting for $150 - $1500 on the New Direction etsy site â€“ www.etsy.com/shops/NewDirection
*If you live in the Portland area and can pick up your purchase, enter coupon code LocalPDX to waive shipping fee.

**The works are also on display in an exhibition called SHOWROOM @ the Lodge Gallery in Portland, OR August 11 - September 30, 2011.

2. I, the artist, recoup 1/3 of the purchase price.

3. I connect with you (purchaser) through email. You will also receive a credit (â€œgift cardâ€) from Kiva.org equal to the remaining 2/3 ($100-$1000) of original purchase price for use on Kiva.org. In addition to an invitation to create Kiva account, you will receive an invitation to the Kiva lending team New Direction â€“ www.kiva.org/team/new_direction 
In the event that you do not create Kiva account and accept Kiva credit, the dollar amount will be accepted by Kiva as donation, not a loan.

4. You (purchaser) are free to choose what loan to fulfill in the lending network with your credited amount, and may choose to pool your credit with other members from the New Direction team to fulfill agreed upon â€œteamâ€ loans.

5. As the recipient of the loan pays the loan back, the money will become available again in your account. You will then be free to choose to fulfill additional loans with this money.

www.kiva.com/team/new_direction
www.etsy.com/shop/NewDirection
nudedirection.blogspot.com

SHOWROOM
@The Lodge Gallery
1532 SW Morrison St.
Portland, OR, 97205 
Hours: Monday-Friday 9-5pm

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: DoSomething
teams.loan_because: DoSomething.org is the countryâ€™s largest not-for-profit for young people and social change. We have 1,666,208 members (and counting) who kick ass on causes they care about. Bullying. Animal cruelty. Homelessness. Cancer. The list goes on. DoSomething.org spearheads national campaigns so 13- to 25-year-olds can make an impact - without ever needing money, an adult, or a car. Over 2.4 million people took action through DoSomething.org in 2012. Why? Because apathy sucks.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Friendly Planet Travel
teams.loan_because: We would like the opportunity to give back to the different countries and locations where we send travelers.
teams.description: A team of caring travelers that would like to continue making a difference around the world.

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: Food Matters - Vegetarians, Vegans, Raw and Friends
teams.loan_because:
We are delighted to be part of a global groundswell of interest in an organic plant based diet free of chemicals and processing.   
We are vegetarians, vegans, raw foodists and people otherwise interested in the wonderful opportunities that a healthier lifestyle or diet can provide.
teams.description:
We are inspired to help others help themselves. 


photo credit: http://www.freedigitalphotos.net/images/view_photog.php?photogid=151

Looking for delicious vegan meals that are easy to prepare? Please see website just below~!
